description.value:
Wondrous Item, Very Rare (Requires Attunement)
This antelope skull is fashioned as a helm and engraved with druidic sigils. While wearing it, you gain a +1 bonus to armor class and are immune to the stunned condition.
Additionally, you can headbutt an opponent. On a hit, the target takes 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage and must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
